Name: Conjury Revell
About the game: Conjury Revell is a first-person shooter with wave-based arena combat. Play as a rebellious dissident fighting to rid their world of magical oppression and forge a better future for their city in the clouds. Diverse Magical Arsenal Switch between 3 different spells and gravity powers to make the arenas work for you to defeat overwhelming numbers attempting to halt your rebellion. Choose between Ice, Fire, and Lightning spells with calculated precision to destroy your foes. City in the clouds Fight between city streets and above the clouds on airships as you assault your foes. Explore a gothic steampunk world and save the city. Visceral frenetic combat Shooter gameplay that keeps you on your toes. Dash, jump, and blast your way through anyone who stands in your way. Use your environment against your foes to keep them at bay while you charge up a powerful spell to eviscerate them.
